institution: Human Resources Development Service of Korea
category: National Human Resources Development Consortium Operating Rules/Article 23 (Use of Training Equipment Costs)
contents: Article 23 (Use of Training Equipment Costs) For joint training centers, costs related to training equipment supported in accordance with Table 1 of the Regulations, 「Contents of Support for Joint Training Centers」, shall be paid in accordance with Table 1 of the Rules, 「Detailed Standards for Support for Joint Training Centers, etc.」 It must be used for purposes directly related to the consortium business.
